## Private Member Functions

### cleanPhiNodes() {#a39190d3f52e9c4dce2cac0d6db847d8c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;DFAJumpThreading.cpp&#125;::TransformDFA::cleanPhiNodes (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
After cloning blocks, some of the phi nodes have extra incoming values that are no longer used.

This function removes them.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/dfajumpthreading-cpp/#l01262">1262</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/dfajumpthreading-cpp">DFAJumpThreading.cpp</a>.

### cloneBlockAndUpdatePredecessor() {#a19e8a44f0b19e974a79b9fd85199ffed}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>BasicBlock &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;DFAJumpThreading.cpp&#125;::TransformDFA::cloneBlockAndUpdatePredecessor (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; PrevBB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp; NextState, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-dfajumpthreading-cpp-/#a3ddf7646269f7d1fd4f236e83fc14ea0">DuplicateBlockMap</a> &amp; DuplicateMap, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-dfajumpthreading-cpp-/#a969421ec3c0c7d7b983f244f9cb99e48">DefMap</a> &amp; NewDefs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreeupdater">DomTreeUpdater</a> &#42; DTU)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Clones a basic block, and adds it to the CFG.

This function also includes updating phi nodes in the successors of the BB, and remapping uses that were defined locally in the cloned BB.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/dfajumpthreading-cpp/#l01083">1083</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/dfajumpthreading-cpp">DFAJumpThreading.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### createExitPath() {#ac90e56ad89e5063254fc120dfde4aa7c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;DFAJumpThreading.cpp&#125;::TransformDFA::createExitPath (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-dfajumpthreading-cpp-/#a969421ec3c0c7d7b983f244f9cb99e48">DefMap</a> &amp; NewDefs, <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-dfajumpthreading-cpp-/threadingpath">ThreadingPath</a> &amp; Path, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-dfajumpthreading-cpp-/#a3ddf7646269f7d1fd4f236e83fc14ea0">DuplicateBlockMap</a> &amp; DuplicateMap, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset">SmallSet</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;, 16 &gt; &amp; BlocksToClean, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreeupdater">DomTreeUpdater</a> &#42; DTU)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
For a specific <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-dfajumpthreading-cpp-/threadingpath">ThreadingPath</a> <code>Path</code>, create an exit path starting from the determinator block.

To remember the correct destination, we have to duplicate blocks corresponding to each state. Also update the terminating instruction of the predecessors, and phis in the successor blocks.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/dfajumpthreading-cpp/#l00987">987</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/dfajumpthreading-cpp">DFAJumpThreading.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getClonedBB() {#a7e58c29d32bef818a9f1719725c93840}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>BasicBlock &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;DFAJumpThreading.cpp&#125;::TransformDFA::getClonedBB (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp; NextState, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-dfajumpthreading-cpp-/#a3ddf7646269f7d1fd4f236e83fc14ea0">DuplicateBlockMap</a> &amp; DuplicateMap)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Checks if BB was already cloned for a particular next state value.

If it was then it returns this cloned block, and otherwise null.

### isLegalAndProfitableToTransform() {#a5eb9fcff7d8888ca5e65783ed29f23ce}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;DFAJumpThreading.cpp&#125;::TransformDFA::isLegalAndProfitableToTransform ()</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
This function performs both a legality check and profitability check at the same time since it is convenient to do so.

It iterates through all blocks that will be cloned, and keeps track of the duplication cost. It also returns false if it is illegal to clone some required block.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/dfajumpthreading-cpp/#l00819">819</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/dfajumpthreading-cpp">DFAJumpThreading.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns true if IncomingBB is a predecessor of BB.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/dfajumpthreading-cpp/#l01318">1318</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/dfajumpthreading-cpp">DFAJumpThreading.cpp</a>.

### updateDefMap() {#abe982055f317e1eb7c901ff4a462c641}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;DFAJumpThreading.cpp&#125;::TransformDFA::updateDefMap (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-dfajumpthreading-cpp-/#a969421ec3c0c7d7b983f244f9cb99e48">DefMap</a> &amp; NewDefs, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abf0f52ae29f87b5e0f2b95ff961cdae1">ValueToValueMapTy</a> &amp; VMap)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Add new value mappings to the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-dfajumpthreading-cpp-/#a969421ec3c0c7d7b983f244f9cb99e48">DefMap</a> to keep track of all new definitions for a particular instruction.

These will be used while updating SSA form.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/dfajumpthreading-cpp/#l01198">1198</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/dfajumpthreading-cpp">DFAJumpThreading.cpp</a>.

### updateLastSuccessor() {#aa881cfcce78ccb07ec7a9f0a3c550855}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;DFAJumpThreading.cpp&#125;::TransformDFA::updateLastSuccessor (<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-dfajumpthreading-cpp-/threadingpath">ThreadingPath</a> &amp; TPath, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-dfajumpthreading-cpp-/#a3ddf7646269f7d1fd4f236e83fc14ea0">DuplicateBlockMap</a> &amp; DuplicateMap, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreeupdater">DomTreeUpdater</a> &#42; DTU)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Update the last branch of a particular cloned path to point to the correct case successor.

Note that this is an optional step and would have been done in later optimizations, but it makes the CFG significantly easier to work with.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/dfajumpthreading-cpp/#l01233">1233</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/dfajumpthreading-cpp">DFAJumpThreading.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### updatePredecessor() {#a4c3b0abd58b31e252d3089ea3f06686f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;DFAJumpThreading.cpp&#125;::TransformDFA::updatePredecessor (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; PrevBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; OldBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; NewBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreeupdater">DomTreeUpdater</a> &#42; DTU)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Sets the successor of PrevBB to be NewBB instead of OldBB.

Note that all other successors are kept as well.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/dfajumpthreading-cpp/#l01178">1178</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/dfajumpthreading-cpp">DFAJumpThreading.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### updateSSA() {#a52dde36a7734846ad7ac8fc9e562051c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;DFAJumpThreading.cpp&#125;::TransformDFA::updateSSA (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-dfajumpthreading-cpp-/#a969421ec3c0c7d7b983f244f9cb99e48">DefMap</a> &amp; NewDefs)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Restore SSA form after cloning blocks.

Each cloned block creates new defs for a variable, and the uses need to be updated to reflect this. The uses may be replaced with a cloned value, or some derived phi instruction. Note that all uses of a value defined in the same block were already remapped when cloning the block.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/dfajumpthreading-cpp/#l01031">1031</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/dfajumpthreading-cpp">DFAJumpThreading.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### updateSuccessorPhis() {#abc6151565920414bc90910b85291ba68}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;DFAJumpThreading.cpp&#125;::TransformDFA::updateSuccessorPhis (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; ClonedBB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp; NextState, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abf0f52ae29f87b5e0f2b95ff961cdae1">ValueToValueMapTy</a> &amp; VMap, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-dfajumpthreading-cpp-/#a3ddf7646269f7d1fd4f236e83fc14ea0">DuplicateBlockMap</a> &amp; DuplicateMap)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Update the phi nodes in BB&#39;s successors.

This means creating a new incoming value from NewBB with the new instruction wherever there is an incoming value from BB.
